data.title: Vlasiator: Hybrid-Vlasov simulation code
data.name: vlasiator
data.description: Vlasiator - ten letters you can count on

evidence: "Vlasiator's computational challenges are immense. We use advanced high performance computing techniques to allow massively parallel computations on tens of thousands of cores." (describes a large HPC simulation code, i.e., an application)
"In Vlasiator, ions are represented as velocity distribution functions... enabling a self-consistent global plasma simulation" (core scientific simulation, directly used to produce research results)
"For first-time cloning, the following is required... git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/fmihpc/vlasiator" (distribution via cloning the source repository)
